attributes.action: Make pubs and clubs use plastic glasses and bottels
attributes.additional_details: Recently I was caught in the middle of a fight that started in a pub, just being in the wrong place at the wrong time. I recieved a glass to my face. Thankfully I got away with just a few stitches and a black eye... If it was a little lower I could have lost my eye sight. Public houses and clubs should be made to use plastic glasses and bottels (even if it's just on weekends)  to reduse the risk of people being bottled or glassed whilst on a night out.
